title: How to Make a Girl Happy when She Is Angry

steps.title: Oftentimes, people just need to let things out.
steps.content: Oftentimes, people just need to let things out. If she needs to talk, let her vent to you. If she wants to yell, take her outside so she can scream and shout as much as she wants. The more she works through her emotions, the quicker she’ll be able to feel happy again. [1] X Expert Source John Keegan Dating Coach Expert Interview. 10 June 2021. Say things like, “Tell me about what happened,” or, “Just let it all out.”

steps.title: Your anger will only feed into her own.
steps.content: Your anger will only feed into her own. Although it can be tough, try to remain calm and level-headed so you can talk her down. If you find yourself getting worked up, take a deep breath and count to 10 before talking. [2] X Research source Sometimes people lash out when they’re angry, even if they aren’t angry at you. If you feel like you can’t have a productive conversation, you can just give her some space to calm down.

steps.title: Talking is great for some people, but not so good for others.
steps.content: Talking is great for some people, but not so good for others. If you think your girlfriend is angry, sit down with her and ask her to tell you what’s wrong. If she doesn’t want to talk, that’s okay, but let her know that you’ll be here when she does. [3] X Expert Source John Keegan Dating Coach Expert Interview. 10 June 2021. If she’s mad at you, it’s unfair of her to expect that you’ll know what’s wrong without talking it out. Wait until she’s calmed down a little, then try to talk with her again.

steps.title: It’s important to let her express herself.
steps.content: It’s important to let her express herself. If you ask her what’s wrong and she starts talking, stay quiet and really listen to what she has to say. If you don’t understand something, ask follow-up questions until you do. [4] X Research source It might be helpful to rephrase what she’s saying in her own words. For instance, you could say, “So what I hear you saying is that you’re mad because I forgot to pick up dinner on my way home.” Reader Poll: We asked 138 wikiHow readers and 49% of them agreed that the best way to comfort a woman is to listen openly and patiently to her feelings and thoughts . [Take Poll]

steps.title: Let her know that it’s okay to be mad right now.
steps.content: Let her know that it’s okay to be mad right now. Even if you don’t quite get it, tell her that you understand why she’s aggravated. Sometimes, people just need to hear that their emotions are valid, and it can help them calm down much easier. [5] X Expert Source John Keegan Dating Coach Expert Interview. 10 June 2021. Say something like, “I understand why that would make you angry. It’s frustrating when someone is late and doesn’t tell you why.”

steps.title: Only apologize if you mean it.
steps.content: Only apologize if you mean it. If a girl is mad at you because of something you did, the best way to make her happy is to say that you’re sorry. However, if you aren’t sorry (or you think you didn’t do anything wrong), keep talking with her and explain your side of the issue. [6] X Research source If you’re apologizing, say something like, “I’m really sorry I didn’t answer your calls all day. I was super busy at work and I forgot to plug my phone in, so it died.” If you don’t think you should apologize, say something like, “I understand that you’re angry, but I did tell you that I’d be busy today. I can’t be on my phone at work all the time.”

steps.title: Use this method if you aren’t sure what to do.
steps.content: Use this method if you aren’t sure what to do. Some people want a hug, other people want flowers, while still others like to be left alone. If your girlfriend is still feeling upset, simply ask what you can do and try your best to accommodate that. [7] X Expert Source John Keegan Dating Coach Expert Interview. 10 June 2021. Phrase it by saying something like, “I can tell you’re still upset. Is there anything I can do to make you feel better?”

steps.title: Your support might just be enough.
steps.content: Your support might just be enough. If you can’t figure out anything else to do, simply tell her you’re there if she needs you. Give her a hug and continue to be there for her however you can. [8] X Research source If you two live far away from each other, tell her that she can call or text you at any time.

steps.title: Sometimes, you just won’t be able to fix a situation.
steps.content: Sometimes, you just won’t be able to fix a situation. If there’s really nothing you can do about the source of her anger, don’t offer advice or give a solution. Usually, it isn’t very helpful to hear, and most people are looking for comfort, not help. [9] X Research source If you think she’s looking for advice, say something like, “Do you want my opinion on the situation?”
